content: be worked back and forth over the previous 33 39 sts needle 2 - sole the remaining stitches will be on hold for the top of the foot needle 1 - instep and are unworked for now turn your work to start on the ws row 1 ws s1 wyif p32 38 turn row 2 rs * s1 k1 repeat from * across until 1 stitch remains k1 turn repeat the two heel flap row until heel measures 2 25 2 5 or desired heel flap length ending after a ws row heel turn row 1 rs s1 k17 21 ssk k1 turn work note not all of the heel flap stitches will have been worked row 2 ws s1 p4 6 p2tog p1 turn row 3 rs s1 k to one stitch before the gap created in the previous row ssk using one stitch from either side of gap k1 turn row 4 ws s1 p to one stitch before the gap created in the previous row p2tog using one stitch from either side of gap p1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 until all heel stitches have been worked 19 23 heel stitches on needle 2 sole you will now be ready to work a right side row ©knittymelissa melissa beyer 2014 2 do not copy sell or distribute without permission gussets set up s1 k 9 11 pm this is your new beginning of round k remaining heel stitches using sole needle pick up and knit in the slipped stitches down the side of your heel flap you will pick up and knit one stitch for every slipped stitch on the edge of the flap which should be half the total number of heel flap row for example if you knit 32 row for the heel flap you will pick up 16 sts pick up one additional stitch between the heel flap and the instep needle to prevent a gap knit the instep stitches in the established pattern continuing where you left off on the leg chart pick up and knit one stitch between the end of the instep and the start of the heel flap then pick up the same number of stitches along the second side of the heel flap as you did for the first side k to end of round marker note as you knit arrange your stitches so that all of your gusset and sole stitches are on one side of your circular needle needle 2 - sole and the 33 39 instep stitches are on the other needle 1 - instep your beginning of round marker will be in the center of needle 2 gusset decreases round 1 decrease round k to 3 sts before end of sole needle k2tog k1 knit instep sts in established pattern using the leg chart on sole needle -
